fixed_skill.desc: Increase 1 ally's damage by 18.0/18.9/19.8%. For every 20% of the target's ailment accuracy, increase damage by 1.0/1.0/1.1% more, up to 6.0/6.3/6.6%. Lasts for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Hunter's Instincts

innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to 1 foe equal to 122.0/126.9/131.8% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 40% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
innate_skill.name: Psio

innate_skill.desc: Increase party's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 6.5%/6.8%/7.2%, and Speed by 3 for 3 turns. For every 25% of the user's ailment accuracy, increase party's ailment accuracy by 1.1%/1.2%/1.2% more, up to 4.4%/4.6%/4.8%.
innate_skill.name: Masukukaja

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 15%. At the start of battle, increase party's ailment accuracy by 9% and by 12% for the ally with the highest ailment accuracy for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Stockfish

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 15%. At the start of battle, increase party's ailment accuracy by 10% and by 14% for the ally with the highest ailment accuracy for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Stockfish I

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
